hymn.title: Oh what joy, children of our God
hymn.category: The Church—As Our Home and Rest

layout.singingstanza: Oh what joy, chil -- dren of our God, In His house, re -- joice be -- fore His face, Re -- count -- ing won -- drous sto -- ries of His grace, Spir -- its lift -- ed, sing -- ing ev -- er end -- less praise.

lyrics.stanza: Oh what joy, children of our God, In His house, rejoice before His face, Recounting wondrous stories of His grace, Spirits lifted, singing ever endless praise.
